code of clash ;

q1 - 


solution code;
import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.math.*;

/**
 * Auto-generated code below aims at helping you parse
 * the standard input according to the problem statement.
 **/
class Solution {

    public static void main(String args[]) {
        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
        int a = in.nextInt();
        int b = in.nextInt();
        int n = in.nextInt();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            int x = in.nextInt();
            int d =a*x+b;
            System.out.println(d);
        }

       // System.out.println();
    }
}
